OCC.DAT:
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_references #ifdefined TEMPLATENAME #info symbol TEMPLATENAME is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define TEMPLATENAME= #Comment
#Comment end_of_references
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_mappings #Comment end_of_mappings
#Comment ---------------------------------------------- #Comment start_of_symbols #Comment end_of_symbols
#Comment ----------------------------------------------

variables String vPath String vTortoiseExeLocation String vMessages String vStatus endvariables
message/nobeep "Starting UnifaceSVN..." $variation = "SVN_LIBRARY"
;---------------------------------------------------- ; Set up our services. ;---------------------------------------------------- call lpSetupServices(); if($status < 0) return <FAILED> endif
;---------------------------------------------------- ; Export changed objects and load the screen. ;---------------------------------------------------- call lpRefreshScreen()
;---------------------------------------------------- ; Put a ready message on the info bar and show the ; screen. ;---------------------------------------------------- message/nobeep "Ready." edit
;---------------------------------------------------- ; Clean up ;---------------------------------------------------- deleteinstance $sourceExp$ deleteinstance $settingsSvc$ deleteinstance $tortoiseSvc$

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate clear() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Clear' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->clear()
#else clear
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate load() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Load' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->load()
#else retrieve if ($status < 0) message $text(1762) ;error endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate load() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Load' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->load()
#else retrieve if ($status < 0) message $text(1762) ;error endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate save() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Save' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->save()
#else store if ($status < 0) message $text(1500) ; error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1723) ; no change else commit if ($status < 0) rollback else message $text(1805) ; Ok endif endif endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate deleteall() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by a 'Delete All' Button). $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->deleteall()
#else erase if ($status < 0) message $text(1763) ;error rollback else if ($status = 1) message $text(1634) ;not allowed else message $text(1806) ;Ok commit endif endif
#endif

#ifdefined frmEntity ; Generated three tier component: Delegate save() to FRM Subtype. ; This allows a uniform implementation that can be invoked ; by other objects too (for example, by an 'OK' Button). if ($formmod) $collhandle("<frmEntity>")->save() ; save modifications if ($status < 0) ; check negative status from Save() return (-1) endif endif
exit (0) #else #endif

#include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_EXPORTCHANGED #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_IMPFROMPATH #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_DOMESSAGES #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_CONCAT_PATHS #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_SETUP_SVCS
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- entry lpRefreshScreen ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
call lpExportChanged() call lpBuildTree() call lpSetFieldSyntax()
end ;lpRefreshScreen
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- entry lpGetNodePath ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- params String pNodeID : IN String pNodePath : OUT endparams
variables String vNodeList String vParentNodeID String vNodeType String vNodeText String vPath String vMessages String vBasePath Numeric vStatus endvariables
getitem/id vNodeList , $fieldvalrep(FILE_TREE), pNodeID getitem vParentNodeID, vNodeList, 1 getitem vNodeType , vNodeList, 2 getitem vNodeText , vNodeList, 3
if(vNodeText = "root") $status = $settingsSvc$->getWorkingCopyPath(vPath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES else vPath = vNodeText endif
while(vParentNodeID != "") getitem/id vNodeList, $fieldvalrep(FILE_TREE), vParentNodeID getitem vParentNodeID, vNodeList, 1 getitem vNodeText , vNodeList, 3 if(vNodeText = "root") $status = $settingsSvc$->getWorkingCopyPath(vBasePath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES vPath = lpConcatPaths(vBasePath, vPath) else vPath = lpConcatPaths(vNodeText, vPath) endif endwhile
pNodePath = vPath
end ;lpGetNodePath
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- entry lpGetFileTree ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- params String pDir : IN String pParent : IN Numeric pLevel : IN String pTreeNodes : INOUT endparams
variables String vMessages String vID String vContent String vFilePath String vSubDir String vSubFileList String vReturnedInfo Boolean vHasModification Boolean vIsSVNItem Numeric vRevisionNumber String vThisNode Numeric vLevel String vFileProperties String vFileAttributes Boolean vNodeState endvariables
vLevel = pLevel + 1 vSubDir = ""
vContent = $ldirlist(pDir, "dir")
getitem vFilePath, vContent, 1 while ($status > 0) if(vFilePath != ".svn") vSubDir = "%%pDir%%%\%%vFilePath%%%" $Counter$ = $Counter$ + 1 vID = $replace (vSubDir, 1 , "\", "", -1) vID = $replace (vID , 1 , ":", "", -1) vID = $replace (vID , 1 , "Csvn_projects", "", -1)
;Should we have this folder expanded? getitem/id vNodeState, $NodeState$, vID if(vNodeState = "OPEN") vThisNode = "%%vID%%%=%%pParent%%%&uNOT;&uSEP;-UNKNOWN&uNOT;&uSEP;%%vFilePath%%%" else vThisNode = "%%vID%%%=%%pParent%%%&uNOT;&uSEP;UNKNOWN&uNOT;&uSEP;%%vFilePath%%%" endif
if(pTreeNodes = "") pTreeNodes = vThisNode else pTreeNodes = "%%pTreeNodes%%%&uSEP;%%vThisNode%%%" endif
call lpGetFileTree(vSubDir, vID, vLevel, pTreeNodes) endif
delitem vContent, 1 getitem vFilePath, vContent, 1 endwhile
vContent = "" vContent = $ldirlist(pDir, "file") getitem vFilePath, vContent, 1 while ($status > 0) vSubDir = "%%pDir%%%\%%vFilePath%%%"
vFileProperties = $lfileproperties(vSubDir) getitem/id vFileAttributes, vFileProperties, "FILEATTRIBUTES"
;R=read-only, H=hidden, S=system, A=archive, C=compressed, E=encypted if( ($scan(vFileAttributes, "H")) = 0 ) $Counter$ = $Counter$ + 1 vID = $replace (vSubDir, 1 , "\", "", -1) vID = $replace (vID , 1 , ":", "", -1) vID = $replace (vID , 1 , "Csvn_projects", "", -1) ;vID = "%%vFilePath%%%_%%$Counter$%%%" ;vID = vSubDir
vThisNode = "%%vID%%%=%%pParent%%%&uNOT;&uSEP;UNKNOWN&uNOT;&uSEP;%%vFilePath%%%"
if(pTreeNodes = "") pTreeNodes = vThisNode else pTreeNodes = "%%pTreeNodes%%%&uSEP;%%vThisNode%%%" endif endif
delitem vContent, 1 getitem vFilePath, vContent, 1 endwhile
return 1
end ;lpGetFileTree
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- entry lpSetFieldSyntax ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vPath String vReturnedInfo String vMessages Boolean vIsSVNItem String vNodeList String vNodeType Numeric vStatus endvariables
$status = $settingsSvc$->getWorkingCopyPath(vPath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES if(vPath = "") vIsSVNItem = 0 $fieldsyntax(CHECKOUT_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" else $status = $tortoiseSvc$->getWCInfo(vPath, "IsSVNItem", vReturnedInfo, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES getitem/id vIsSVNItem, vReturnedInfo, "IsSVNItem" endif
if(vIsSVNItem) $fieldsyntax(CHECKOUT_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM"
getitem/id vNodeList , $fieldvalrep(FILE_TREE), FILE_TREE.DUMMY getitem vNodeType , vNodeList, 2
if(FILE_TREE != "") $fieldsyntax(DELETE_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "" $fieldsyntax(UPDATE_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "" $fieldsyntax(COMMIT_BUTTON.DUMMY) = ""
if(vNodeType = "FILEMOD" | vNodeType = "FLDMOD") $fieldsyntax(DIFF_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "" $fieldsyntax(REVERT_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "" else $fieldsyntax(DIFF_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(REVERT_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" endif
if(vNodeType != "FILE" & vNodeType != "FOLDER") $fieldsyntax(LOG_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "" else $fieldsyntax(LOG_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" endif else $fieldsyntax(DIFF_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(LOG_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(REVERT_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(DELETE_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(UPDATE_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(COMMIT_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" endif else $fieldsyntax(DIFF_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(LOG_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(REVERT_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(DELETE_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(UPDATE_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(COMMIT_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" $fieldsyntax(REFRESH_BUTTON.DUMMY) = "DIM" endif
end ;lpSetFieldSyntax
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- entry lpBuildTree ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vBaseDir String vMessages String vTreeNode String vType String vTreeList String vSelectedNode Numeric vStatus endvariables
$settingsSvc$->getWorkingCopyPath(vBaseDir, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES
$stopUpdateNodeTypes$ = 1 vSelectedNode = FILE_TREE.DUMMY
$Counter$ = 0 $Level$ = 0 clear/e "DUMMY"
call lpGetFileTree(vBaseDir, "root", 0, vTreeNode)
call lpGetNodeType(vBaseDir, vType) vTreeList = "root=&uNOT;&uSEP;-%%vType%%%&uNOT;&uSEP;root&uSEP;%%vTreeNode%%%"
$fieldvalrep(FILE_TREE.DUMMY) = vTreeList show
if(vSelectedNode != "") $instancehandle->updateNodeTypes(1) endif
$stopUpdateNodeTypes$ = 0
end ;lpBuildTree
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- entry lpGetNodeParent ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- params String pNodeID : IN String pParentID : OUT endparams
variables String vNodeList String vNodeProperties String vParentNodeID String vNodeID endvariables
vNodeList = $fieldvalrep(FILE_TREE) getitem/id vNodeProperties, vNodeList, pNodeID getitem pParentID, vNodeProperties , 1
return <OK>
end ; lpGetNodeParent
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- entry lpGetNodeType ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- params String pNodePath : IN String pNodeType : OUT endparams
variables String vReturnedInfo String vMessages Boolean vHasModification Boolean vIsSVNItem Numeric vRevisionNumber Numeric vStatus endvariables
$status = $tortoiseSvc$->getWCInfo(pNodePath, "HasModifications&uSEP;IsSVNItem&uSEP;Revision", vReturnedInfo, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES getitem/id vHasModification, vReturnedInfo, "HasModifications" getitem/id vIsSVNItem , vReturnedInfo, "IsSVNItem" getitem/id vRevisionNumber , vReturnedInfo, "Revision"
;If this node is a folder if($lfileexists(pNodePath) = 2) if(vHasModification & vIsSVNItem & vRevisionNumber > 0) pNodeType = "FLDMOD" elseif(vHasModification & vIsSVNItem & vRevisionNumber <= 0) pNodeType = "FLDADD" elseif(vIsSVNItem & !vHasModification) pNodeType = "FLDINSVN" else pNodeType = "FOLDER" endif ;If this node is a file elseif($lfileexists(pNodePath) = 1) if(vHasModification & vIsSVNItem) if(vRevisionNumber > 0) pNodeType = "FILEMOD" else pNodeType = "FILEADD" endif elseif(vIsSVNItem) pNodeType = "FILEINSVN" else pNodeType = "FILE" endif endif
return <OK>
end ;lpGetNodeType

;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation diff ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vCommand String vPath String vMessages Numeric vStatus endvariables
call lpGetNodePath(FILE_TREE.DUMMY, vPath)
$status = $tortoiseSvc$->callDiff(vPath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES
end ;diff
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation log ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vCommand String vPath String vMessages Numeric vStatus endvariables
call lpGetNodePath(FILE_TREE.DUMMY, vPath)
$status = $tortoiseSvc$->callLog(vPath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES
end ;log
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation revert ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vCommand String vPath String vMessages Numeric vStatus endvariables
call lpGetNodePath(FILE_TREE.DUMMY, vPath)
;Call Tortoise revert screen message/nobeep "Calling TortoiseSVN revert..." $status = $tortoiseSvc$->callRevert(vPath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES
;Reimport all the source under vPath, as it may have changed message/nobeep "Reimporting reverted source..." call lpImportFromPath(vPath)
;Rebuild the source tree view, as it might have changed message/nobeep "Revert complete. Rebuilding tree..." call lpBuildTree() message/nobeep "Done."
end ;revert
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation delete ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vCommand String vPath String vMessages Numeric vStatus endvariables
call lpGetNodePath(FILE_TREE.DUMMY, vPath)
askmess/question "Are you sure you want to delete %%vPath%%%?","Yes,No" if ($status = 2) ;No return endif
;Call Tortoise delete screen message/nobeep "Calling TortoiseSVN remove..." $status = $tortoiseSvc$->callRemove(vPath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES
;Rebuild the source tree view, as it might have changed message/nobeep "Delete complete. Rebuilding tree..."
;Need to rebuild the actual tree structure here, as an item has been removed. call lpBuildTree()
message/nobeep "Done."
end ;delete
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation update ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vCommand String vPath String vMessages Numeric vStatus endvariables
call lpGetNodePath(FILE_TREE.DUMMY, vPath)
;Call Tortoise revert screen message/nobeep "Calling TortoiseSVN update..." $status = $tortoiseSvc$->callUpdate(vPath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES
;Reimport all the source under vPath, as it may have changed message/nobeep "Importing updated source..." call lpImportFromPath(vPath)
;Rebuild the source tree view, as it might have changed message/nobeep "Update complete. Rebuilding tree..."
;Need to rebuild the actual tree structure here, as an item has been removed. call lpBuildTree()
message/nobeep "Done."
end ;update
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation commit ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vPath String vMessages String vNodeList String vNodeProperties String vParentNodeID Numeric vStatus endvariables
call lpGetNodePath(FILE_TREE.DUMMY, vPath)
message/nobeep "Calling TortoiseSVN commit..." $status = $tortoiseSvc$->callCommit(vPath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES
message/nobeep "Commit complete. Rebuilding tree..." $instancehandle->updateNodeTypes(1) message/nobeep "Done."
end ;commit
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation refresh ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
call lpExportChanged() call lpBuildTree()
end ;refresh
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation checkout ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vRepositoryPath String vMessages String vBaseDir Numeric vStatus endvariables
$status = $settingsSvc$->getRepositoryPath(vRepositoryPath, vMessages) if($status < 0 | vRepositoryPath = "") message "UnifaceSVN: Error - See message frame for details." putmess "UnifaceSVN: %%$componentName%%% - SVN repository path not set." return <FAILED> endif
$status = $settingsSvc$->getWorkingCopyPath(vBaseDir, vMessages) if($status < 0) message "UnifaceSVN: Error - See message frame for details." putmess "UnifaceSVN: %%$componentName%%% - Working copy directory not set." return <FAILED> endif
askmess/question "Are you sure you want to checkout from %%vRepositoryPath%%%?%%^This could lead to overwriting items in the current Uniface repository.","Yes,No" if ($status = 2) ;No return endif
;Call Tortoise checkout screen message/nobeep "Calling TortoiseSVN checkout..." $status = $tortoiseSvc$->callCheckout(vBaseDir, vRepositoryPath, vMessages) #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES
;Reimport all the source under the working copy, as it may have changed message/nobeep "Importing checked out source..." call lpImportFromPath(vBaseDir)
call lpRefreshScreen()
end ;checkout
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation about ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- variables String vMessages Numeric vStatus endvariables
activate "SVN_ABOUT_F" #include SVN_LIBRARY:IP_POSTCALL_PRES
end ;about
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation ok ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
MACRO "^QUIT"
end ;settings
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation updateChildObjects ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- ; This entry retrieves and updates the type on child objects of pObjectId. params String pObjectId : IN Boolean pForceUpdate : IN endparams
variables String vNodeList String vNodeProperties String vParentNodeID String vNodeType String vNodeText String vCurrentNode String vIDAndParent String vID String vParentID String vType String vName endvariables
vNodeList = $fieldvalrep(FILE_TREE) getitem/id vNodeProperties, vNodeList, pObjectId
getitem vParentNodeID, vNodeProperties , 1 getitem vNodeType , vNodeProperties , 2 getitem vNodeText , vNodeProperties , 3
getitem vCurrentNode, vNodeList, 1 while($status > 0) getitem vIDAndParent, vCurrentNode, 1 vID = $idpart(vIDAndParent) vParentID = $valuepart(vIDAndParent) getitem vType, vCurrentNode, 2 getitem vName, vCurrentNode, 3
if(vParentID = pObjectId) if(vType = "UNKNOWN" | vType = "-UNKNOWN" | pForceUpdate) $instancehandle->updateNode(vID, vParentID, vName) endif endif
delitem vNodeList, 1 getitem vCurrentNode, vNodeList, 1 endwhile
return 0
end ;updateChildObjects
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation updateNodeTypes ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- params Boolean pForceUpdate : IN endparams
variables String vNodeList String vCurrentNode String vIDAndParent String vID String vParentID String vType String vName String vNodeState Boolean vParentsOpen endvariables
$instancehandle->updateNode("root", "", "root")
vNodeList = $fieldvalrep(FILE_TREE)
;Loop over each node and update it if $NodeState$ ;says it is open AND that all it's parents are open getitem vCurrentNode, vNodeList, 1 while($status > 0) getitem vIDAndParent, vCurrentNode, 1 vID = $idpart(vIDAndParent) vParentID = $valuepart(vIDAndParent) getitem vType, vCurrentNode, 2 getitem vName, vCurrentNode, 3
;Is this node open? getitem/id vNodeState, $NodeState$, vID if(vNodeState = "OPEN") ;Are all it's parents open? ;call lpCheckParentsOpen(vID, vParentsOpen) vParentsOpen = 1 if(vParentsOpen) $instancehandle->updateChildObjects(vID, pForceUpdate) endif endif
delitem vNodeList, 1 getitem vCurrentNode, vNodeList, 1 endwhile
return 0
end ;updateNodeTypes
;-------------------------------------------------------------------- operation updateNode ;-------------------------------------------------------------------- params String pID : IN String pParentID : IN String pName : IN endparams
variables String vNodePath String vType endvariables
call lpGetNodePath(pID, vNodePath) call lpGetNodeType(vNodePath, vType) call FILE_TREE_setObject(pID, pParentID, vType, pName)
return <OK>
end ;updateNode

;-------------------------------------------- entry <$fieldname>_setObject ;-------------------------------------------- ; Adds/updates object to/in tree structure. params String pObjectId : IN ; Unique Id, of the to be added or updated object, in format "ObjectId" String pParentObjectId : IN ; Object's parent object, in format "" | "ObjectId", where: ; - "" ; defines object as root ; - "ObjectId" ; defines object's parent object String pObjectType : IN ; Object's type in format "ObjectType" String pObjectName : IN ; Object's textual representation of type single line string endparams
variables String vInstruction, vObjectData endvariables
putitem vObjectData, 1, pParentObjectId ; Set ParentObjectId putitem vObjectData, 2, pObjectType ; Set ObjectExpand and ObjectType putitem vObjectData, 3, pObjectName ; Set Name
vInstruction = "0=" ; Initialize tree instruction: Add/Update single Object putitem/id vInstruction, pObjectId, vObjectData ; Add Object data to instruction $fieldvalrep("<$fieldname>.<$entname>") = vInstruction ; Assign the instruction to the tree widget
if($interactive) show ; Force the tree widget to process the instruction endif end

;----------------------------------------------- trigger Expand ;----------------------------------------------- params String control : IN ; TREE | LIST | KEYBOARD String pItem : IN endparams
variables String vNodePath String vNodeList String vNewNodes String vObjectData String vInstruction endvariables
putmess "%%$fieldname%%% - %%pItem%%%"
;Log that this node is open putitem/id $NodeState$, pItem, "OPEN" putmess $NodeState$
; Update the type on child objects for the selected tree object ;$instancehandle->updateChildObjects(pItem, 0) if($stopUpdateNodeTypes$ != 1) $instancehandle->updateNodeTypes(0) endif
return $status
end ; trigger Expand
;----------------------------------------------- trigger Collapse ;----------------------------------------------- params String control : IN ; TREE | LIST | KEYBOARD String pItem : IN endparams
;Log that this node is closed delitem/id $NodeState$, pItem putmess $NodeState$
end ; trigger Collapse
trigger Open params string control: in ; TREE | LIST | KEYBOARD string item: in endparams debug end ; trigger Open
trigger Close params string control: in ; TREE | LIST | KEYBOARD string item: in endparams debug end ; trigger Close
trigger doubleClick params string control: in ; TREE | LIST | KEYBOARD string item: in endparams
end ; trigger doubleClick
trigger columnSorted params numeric columnId: in string sortingOrder: in ; ASC | DESC endparams debug end ; trigger columnSorted
trigger columnWidth params numeric id: in numeric pWidth: in endparams debug end ; trigger columnWidth
trigger representationChanging params string itemValue: in endparams debug end ; trigger representationChanging
trigger representationChanged ; Only works if tree widget property INLINEEDIT=TRUE params string itemValue: in string control: in ; TREE | LIST string newRepresentation: in endparams variables string treeItem, listUpdate endvariables debug getitem/id treeItem, $valrep, itemValue putitem treeItem, 3, newRepresentation ; Change representation listUpdate = "0=" ; Indicate partial valrep update putitem/id listUpdate, itemValue, treeItem $valrep = listUpdate
end ; trigger representationChanged
; start drag & drop triggers for tree widget
trigger moveTo params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in string itemvalue: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams debug end ; trigger moveTo
trigger moveFrom params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams debug end ; trigger moveFrom
trigger moveWithin params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in string itemvalue: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams debug end ; trigger moveWithin
trigger copyTo params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in string itemvalue: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams debug end ; trigger copyTo
trigger createShortcutTo params string dragvalue: in string dropformat: in string itemvalue: in numeric numberofobjects: in numeric index: in endparams debug end ; trigger createShortcutTo
; -- end triggers for tree widget
